question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Kiek Rijksmonumenten (nacionalini킬 paveldo objekt킬) yra Leeuwardene, Nyderlanduose?
answer: Leeuwardene, Nyderlanduose, yra apie 800 Rijksmonumenten (nacionalini킬 paveldo objekt킬).
answer_translated_eng: Leeuwarden, in the Netherlands, is home to around 800 Rijksmonumenten (National Heritage Sites).
